availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Son of Thomas Cardwell and Ariminta Cardwell. Married to Ellen South in Breathitt County on April 18, 1853. Father of Charles O. Cardwell, Arra C. Cardwell, Analiza Cardwell, Maranda Cardwell, Adline B. Cardwell, Jerah Cardwell, and Ellen Cardwell. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Merchant in Breathitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1.
